overview: Every now and then, Country Music produces an artist or song that transcends the genre and crosses over into mainstream music - Lynn Anderson is one of these artists and her hit "Rose Garden" propelled her to international fame and put country music firmly in the spotlight.  Now for the first time, Lynn Anderson presents a live performance on DVD covering all her hits including "Ride, Ride, Ride," "Rocky Top," "Cry," and of course "Rose Garden".  Enjoy an intimate evening of music and entertainment from a country music great.
title: Lynn Anderson: Live
